synopsis.text: After competing in an intraschool music competition, budding violinist Kahoko Hino continues honing her skills at the prestigious Seiso Academy. She crosses paths with several new figures who impact her musical journey - the blunt Et≈ç Kiriya who challenges her abilities, school board director Akihiko Kira who oversees academy affairs, and transfer student Aoi Kaji whose exceptional musical talent intrigues Kahoko. With guidance from a magical musical sprite named Lili and fellow talented musicians, Kahoko gains confidence while preparing for future competitions. This heartwarming anime highlights the transformative power of determination and teamwork in nurturing artistic passion.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
